heading: Today
text: Morning clouds northeast clearing.  Mostly sunny.  Not as breezy, but still cool.  Highs in the 50s.  Winds north near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear from the Green Mountains east.  Some high clouds moving in from the west. Possibly a sprinkle in the St. Lawrence Valley.  Lows in the 30s west, upper 20s and low 30s east. Scattered to widespread frost.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Sunshine east, and morning clouds mixing with sunshine west.  Not as cold.  Highs in the upper 50s to low 60s.  Light winds, mainly south less than 10 mph.
